heif.boxes

Class ColourInformationBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • heif.boxes.Box
      • heif.boxes.ColourInformationBox

  • public class ColourInformationBox
extends Box
    This derived class handles the Box identified as colr - Colour information Box. For technical details, refer to the Specification document - ISO/IEC 14496-12:2015 in Page 158. This box contains information about the colour space of the image. Its content varies based on the colourType field.

    API Note:This implementation handles nclx colour types fully. For rICC and prof types, the ICC profile data is ignored as its parsing is beyond the current scope of this box. Further testing is needed for edge cases and compatibility if required.

    Since:
    13 August 2025
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Trevor Maggs

    • Constructor Detail

      • ColourInformationBox

        public ColourInformationBox(Box box,
                            ByteStreamReader reader)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Constructs a ColourInformationBox from a parent Box and a byte reader. This constructor parses the specific fields of the colr box based on its 'colourType'.
        Parameters:
        box - the super Box object
        reader - a ByteStreamReader object for sequential byte array access
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if malformed data is detected

    • Method Detail

      • getColourType

        public java.lang.String getColourType()
        Returns the 4-character string identifying the colour type. Examples include nclx, rICC and prof.
        Returns:
        the colour type string

      • getColourPrimaries

        public int getColourPrimaries()
        Returns the colour primaries value for nclx colour types. This value defines the chromaticity of the primaries and the white point.
        Returns:
        the colour primaries, or 0 if not an 'nclx' type or not parsed

      • getTransferCharacteristics

        public int getTransferCharacteristics()
        Returns the transfer characteristics value for nclx colour types. This value defines the opto-electronic transfer characteristic of the source picture.
        Returns:
        the transfer characteristics, or 0 if not an 'nclx' type or not parsed.

      • getMatrixCoefficients

        public int getMatrixCoefficients()
        Returns the matrix coefficients value for nclx colour types. This value defines the matrix coefficients used in deriving luminance and chrominance signals.
        Returns:
        the matrix coefficients, or 0 if not an 'nclx' type or not parsed

      • isFullRangeFlag

        public boolean isFullRangeFlag()
        Returns the full range flag for nclx colour types. true indicates full range representation, false indicates limited range.
        Returns:
        the full range flag, or false if not an 'nclx' type or not parsed

      • getIccProfile

        public byte[] getIccProfile()
        Returns the full bytes of ICC profile data as an array.
        Returns:
        the array of bytes

      • logBoxInfo

        public void logBoxInfo()
        Logs the box hierarchy and internal entry data at the debug level.

        It provides a visual representation of the box's HEIF/ISO-BMFF structure. It is intended for tree traversal and file inspection during development and degugging if required.

        Overrides:
        logBoxInfo in class Box
